sentences.english: To transliterate from a published work into Braille for publication.
sentences.chinese: 将已经发表的作品改成盲文出版。

sentences.english: The Braille detection technology has been designed to work in both hardcopy and electronic environments.
sentences.chinese: 盲文检测技术被设计为工作在印刷版和电子环境。

sentences.english: For her, Braille is a cornerstone of education.
sentences.chinese: 对她来说，盲文是教育的基石。

sentences.english: Braille opened up a new world of possibility and education.
sentences.chinese: 盲文开创了教育契机的新世界。

sentences.english: He has transcribed that book into braille.
sentences.chinese: 他已经把那本书译成了盲文。

sentences.english: When a text message arrives, Nokia Braille Reader automatically open its main view.
sentences.chinese: 当短信来时，诺基亚盲文阅读器会自动打开其主视图。

sentences.english: The best part, we had our own library with books in Braille.
sentences.chinese: 最棒的是，我们还有自己的盲文图书馆。

sentences.english: Braille is attached to literacy and to success in employment.
sentences.chinese: 盲文是识字和就业成功的保障。

sentences.english: "You had a whole generation that grew up without Braille, " he says.
sentences.chinese: “你们有整整一代人未曾接触过盲文，”他说。

sentences.english: A lot of the blind can read the Braille.
sentences.chinese: 在一所盲人学校，安妮学了布莱叶盲文。

sentences.english: The organization transcribes around 1, 000 items into Braille each year.
sentences.chinese: 该组织每年大约将1000份材料转录为盲文。

sentences.english: At an institution for the blind, Annie learned braille.
sentences.chinese: 在一所盲人学校，安妮学了布莱叶盲文。

sentences.english: They were also the fastest Braille readers in the group.
sentences.chinese: 他们阅读布莱叶盲文的速度也最快。

sentences.english: Confusion of homonym is a long-term disturbing problem in current Chinese Braille.
sentences.chinese: 同音词混淆是长期困扰现行盲文的问题。

sentences.english: Another option is a Braille rendering device.
sentences.chinese: 另一个选择是盲文翻译设备。

sentences.english: transliteration of a published work into Braille and publication of the work so transliterated.
sentences.chinese: 将已经发表的作品改成盲文出版。

definition: Braille (name)/Louis Braille (1809-1852), French educator who invented braille
Hanyu Pinyin, the romanization system used in the PRC since the 1960s
Chinese character/CL:個|个[ge4]/Japanese: kanji/Korean: hanja/Vietnamese: hán tự
